name: Silly Fishing Game
description:
We fishing!

Silly Fishing Game is a little project I made for fun to keep me coding, but became a fun little high score game!

In Silly Fishing you lower your hook with Space and move you boat with A&S to catch as many fish as you can. To reel them in, you've got to hit the letters that appear on screen, but hitting the wrong ones will allow the fish to wiggle free!

Big thank you to everyone who watched me on stream, showing it off feature by feature as I made it and showing interest in what I was making.
